subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The pitching coach Dan Warthen called Oliver Pérez “out of shape” after Pérez failed to get through the fourth inning of the Mets’ 10-6 loss to the Detroit Tigers.
snippet: The pitching coach Dan Warthen called Oliver Pérez “out of shape” after Pérez failed to get through the fourth inning of the Mets’ 10-6 loss to the Detroit Tigers.
